text: Bar qavmi Samud ʙarodarason Solehro firistodem. Guft: «Ej qavmi man, Ollohro ʙiparasted, sumoro hec xudoe cuz U nest. Az coniʙi Xudo ʙaroi sumo nisonae oskor omad. In modasuturi Xudo ʙarojaton nisonaest. Uro ʙiguzored to dar zamini Xudo ʙicarad va hec oseʙe ʙa u narasoned, ki azoʙe dardovar sumoro faro xohad girift
